attributes.action: reverse the statement made by the Foreign Secretary that the UK Government recognises China's authority over Tibet and Tibet forms part of China and revert to the historic UK position that it is an independent nation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Chinese occupation of Tibet was achieved by force of arms in a way entirely comparable with the occupation of European nations by the Nazi forces in the Second World War and I therefore consider that the Chinese have no more right to rule in the region now than the Nazis did then
